title: Books for Lost
description: A handpicked list for when you're feeling lost.

books.author: Dolly Alderton
books.description: A funny and deeply personal memoir of friendship, love, and growing up.

books.author: Joan Didion
books.description: A moving, honest, and raw reflection on grief and memory after the loss of a husband.

books.description: Indigenous wisdom, scientific knowledge, and the teachings of plants.
